chatbot-desc: Provides an interface to AI chatbots (LLM/GPT)
chatbot-i18n-welcome: Welcome to the localization file of the Chatbot extension.
chatbot-special-hdfviewer-intro: Embeds an AI chatbot in the wiki per [[Special:Chatbot]]. Currently only supports [https://github.com/h2oai/h2ogpt h2ogpt] e. g. with [https://github.com/OpenSemanticWorld/h2ogpt-cpu-docker-compose h2ogpt-cpu].
